channel.title: Raiding, griefing, stealing PvP sever IP: Chaos.Discovr.Us
channel.description:
Chaos is a PvP, stealing, raiding, griefing server. During the day you gather resources when PvP is turned off, then at night the true Chaos awakens. Pvp is enabled at night, that's when you make your move to go raid or grief someone's base. Make a team and eventually make an Embassy in spawn. This is a 100 slot server with stable connection to The United States and Europe. Website: Discovr.us Chaos Server: Chaos.Discovr.Us
-Nanochip and the staff.

item.title: Raiding, griefing, stealing PvP sever IP: Chaos.Discovr.Us
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“omgilikepie, post:2, topic:437609”]lmao…

Why would someone want to play on a server where people can grief your stuff with no repercussions.[/quote]
because it’s clearly not all about spending hours making gay-ass structures

Read full topic
